alert.note: Alert for Newton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 11:22AM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Alcovy River near High Point affecting Newton County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Alcovy River near High Point. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 11 feet, Flood Stage is reached. Minor flooding begins of woodlands and fields near the river upstream and downstream from the gage on Henderson Mill Road. The water level reaches the first wooden step behind an elevated private residence just upstream and on the left bank from the bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM EDT Friday the stage was 11.5 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 11 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
